text: Thomas Alexander McLean (7 July 1876 – 14 August 1948) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood and Geelong in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He played football while studying to become a doctor and while a resident doctor at Geelong Hospital, before commencing private practice in Traralgon. == Notes == == External links == * *Tom McLean's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1876 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Geelong Football Club players
title: Tom McLean (footballer, born 1876)
